pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, July 22, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

12:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the National Summit on Islamophobia.

The National Summit will be streamed live on Canadian Heritage’s official Facebook page: www.facebook.com/CdnHeritage.
